body_html: It would be good for there to be an explanation about what the fbcode-side constraints are, so future people editing the files later don't undo changes which are seemingly equivalent. I guess most of the faffing about has to do with making --template-paths configurable?
body_text: It would be good for there to be an explanation about what the fbcode-side constraints are, so future people editing the files later don't undo changes which are seemingly equivalent. I guess most of the faffing about has to do with making --template-paths configurable?
body: It would be good for there to be an explanation about what the fbcode-side constraints are, so future people editing the files later don't undo changes which are seemingly equivalent. I guess most of the faffing about has to do with making `--template-paths` configurable?
